entry.title: Cenos7Yun安装Python3
entry.content: 安装EPEL和IUS软件源 yum install epel-release -y yum install https://centos7.iuscommunity.org/ius-release.rpm -y 安装Python3.6 yum install python36u -y 创建python3连接符 ln -s /bin/python3.6 /bin/python3 安装pip3 yum install python36u-pip -y 创建pip3链接符 ln -s /bin/pip3.6 /bin/pip3
